mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-4, southwest wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Donohue, Liam Patrick [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Partially legible German phrase. Invitation to rate the physical attractiveness of a named individual, with one recorded response. Quote attributed to RW (possibly Ron Weasley, of Harry Potter). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Es reicht nicht loi scheide Doch | Check if you think Harry Wright is a cute English guy | ["She (really) needs to sort out her priorities." -RW]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sexual attraction
Quotations
Harry Potter films
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
